pages.text: xallxhˌ thrng hı klangkhun læa klangwan hmunweiyn klabpiklabma thæcring nı laksʹna chen nan nænxn man pen khx takteuxn sti kæ phu mi sayta phicarna

læa xallxhˌ thrng hı bangkeid sing mi chiwit thuk chnid cak na dangnan nı hmu phwk man man ca kheluxn yay dwy thxng khxng man læa nı hmu phwk man man ca dein dwy thea thang sxng læa nı hmu phwk man man ca dein dwy thea thang si xallxhˌ thrng bangkeid sing thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh thæcring xallxhˌ nan thrng xanuphaph henux thuk sing
doy nænxn rea di prathan xongkar tang«xan chad cæng læa xallxhˌ thrng chinæa thang kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh yang thang thi theiyngtrng

læa phwk khea klaw kan wa rea sraththa tx xallxhˌ læa xar rx sul læa rea cheuxfang ptibati tam læw swn hnung cak phwk khea k han hlang klab pi hlangcak nan læa phwk hela nan michı phu sraththa xyang thæcring
læa meux phwk khea thuk reiyk rxng pi su xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh pheux hı tadsin rahwang phwk khea meux nan fay hnung cak phwk khea pha kan phinhlanghı
læa hakwakhwam cringxyu khang phwk khea læw phwk khea ca rib ma ha khea (muhammad) xyang nxbnxm

nı hawcı khxng phwk khea mi rokh kranan hrux hrux wa phwk khea sngsay hrux wa phwk khea klaw wa xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh ca laxeiyng xxk cak phwk khea hamidi phwk khea hela ni pen phu xthrrm tanghak

Thæcring kha klaw khxng brrda phu sraththa meux phwk khea thuk reiyk rxng pi su xallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh pheux hı tadsin rahwang phwk khea phwk khea ca klaw wa rea diyin læw læa rea cheuxfang ptibati tam læa chn hela ni phwk khea pen phu prasb khwam sarec
læa phu dı cheuxfang ptibati ta mxallxhˌ læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa ke rng klaw xallxhˌ læa yakerng phraxngkh læw dangnan chn hela nan phwk khea pen phu di rab chaychna

læa phwk khea di saban dwy phranam khx ngxallxhˌ doy kar saban xyang khængkhan khxng phwk khea wa hak cea mi kha sang kæ phwk khea nænxn phwk khea k ca xxk pi cng klaw theid (muhammad) phwk cea xya saban ley kar cheuxfang (khxng phwk cea nan) pen thi ru kan di thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng ru di ying nı sing thi phwk cea kratha
